vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.19.14
§ Sceva, (Proper name), Acts 19:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
士基瓦
1) 一個祭司長, 住在以弗所 (徒 19:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
士基瓦

vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Sê-va, một vị trưởng tế người Do-thái
